section.title: Description
section.p: A care plan guideline is a statement expressed by a professional organization in order to influence how care is delivered. A guideline is a "best practice" and may be driven by historic precidents and outcomes - adapted from the HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model

stentry.p: Uniquely identifies the Care Plan Guideline. The Care Plan Guideline will typically be issued by a professional association or by the organization responsible for the care of the Patient. The organization can be identified by the issuer of the identifier which is in the "system" subfield of the ID datatype.
Contains the narrative or content of the Care Plan Guideline.
